Parts.A: Young one..you only can bring me more runes after a full day has passed.

Greetings, young One. I am Harrod..and I can teach you a special fighting move to enrage the fearsome Arena Champions.
  If you are interested - all it takes is to bring a me five different runes - that you'll might find, if you beat the Champion in normal combat.
  Or I can tell you of blueprints and fabled craftsmen, if you are looking for those.

That's the spirit! Well - go and fight the Champions of
  Hathor Ka, Master Gyas, Thyri, Kyllikki and Torgrimur Skald.
  Search their bodies for runes! If you have all five of them, come back and I shall teach you!
Parts.B: Sounds complicated - but I'll get them!
Parts.C: All of them? I need better gear first

Parts.A: Hello again, young One! Did you find the runes?

That's not all of them. Come back, when you have them *ALL*.
  The stygian rune,the lemurian rune, the rune of the pitfighter and the mitran rune.
  No less will do!

Yes, that's all of them! You're quite veteran, ha? Well, well..you brought them, so you'll get your reward.
  If you fight them, then do this special move early - they will grow a purple shied, that you'll need to take off - by using the ability again.
  Be in melee range!
Parts.B: Early in fight. Melee range. Take shield off. Fine\
Parts.C: Uh..maybe. I am not ready for that.

Parts.A:
Ah. Blueprints. Hmm. - Some are easy, if you just look around here. *He coughs and looks over to the bookshelf*

  The rare journals - depending on what you seek, you might want to investigate
  the Witchqueen palace for nice silk clothes,
  meet Gyas's assistant on their island in the savage lands or
  seek out a high pinnacle in front of the buccaneer bay.
Parts.C: I read those. I'll come back another time.

Parts.A:
Ah. The fabled craftsmen. Let me see, if I can remember them all.

  The blacksmiths! Ivarr, he resides in the north, around and in Asgarath. Alfhild. Some claim, they've seen her at the Black Galleon.
  The armorers. Ha. Berglind always roams around the Mounds and in the little camps. Some say, she comes south to the Den sometimes. Thorunn and Talaan..they talk a lot with the pirates of the black hand. Might be a good lead to try around the Black Galleon.
  The Alchemists. Gabriela, she often is in Asgarath or at the Wardtowers. Some claim, they have seen the gemcutter at the wardtowers as well. But Serpa mostly is seen in Sepermeru.
  Landora..groomer. Ha. She's with the Lemurians in the jungle. Katla, the smelter - she can be encountered at the northern camps or at Asgarath.
  Floki. He seems to like the same spots as Beast the Breaker. Try down at the river, west of the sandswept ruins.
  The other taskmasters. Julia can be found among the Darfari at spinebreaker. *LADY* - he snorts - Elizabeth Killigrew, they say she is at the Volcano. But I've seen her lurking at the den as well. Viek - he barely leaves Sepermeru. Akasuki - that one enjoys company of the northern tribes around Asgarath, much like Fass.
  And hm..oh yes. The carpenter. Hekla. She hides at the Mounds.
  I think, that's all of them, I remember.
